about_the_game:
Step into the thrilling world of AI Schoolgirls Murder Mystery, where nothing is as it seems at a prestigious boarding school shrouded in mystery. A popular student, Hide Okikage, has been murdered, and it’s up to you to solve the case before time runs out. Interrogate three suspects, each with secrets of their own—Miyagi, Yuki, and Dana. Powered by advanced AI, the suspects’ dynamic responses will challenge your intuition. Can you uncover the truth hidden within the school’s eerie halls?

Key Features:

• AI-Driven Conversations: Engage in lifelike interactions with suspects, uncovering clues as you piece together the mystery.
• Multiple Endings: Your choices and deductions shape the outcome, leading to multiple endings.
• Rich Storyline: Explore a complex narrative of rumors, secrets, and betrayal.
• Atmospheric Setting: Experience a tense, immersive atmosphere as the investigation unfolds within a serene yet eerie boarding school.
• Interactive Investigations: Use your questioning skills to navigate lies and hidden motives, all while racing against the clock.

Are you ready to unravel the web of deception and expose the real killer?
